value.name: Location Descriptor
value.description: Divine a descriptor for your location

value.name: Settlement Name
value.description: Divine the name of a settlement

random-oracles.name: A feature of the landscape
random-oracles.description: A feature of the landscape. Envision what it is. What makes it unusual or distinctive?

random-oracles.name: A man made edifice
random-oracles.description: A man made edifice. What is it? Why is it important to this settlement's history?

random-oracles.name: A creature
random-oracles.description: A creature. Why have the people of this settlement chosen this creature as their totem? How is it represented in art or rituals?

random-oracles.name: A historical event
random-oracles.description: A historical event. What happened here? What place or practice commemorates this event?

random-oracles.name: A word in an Old World language
random-oracles.description: A word in an Old World language. What culture is represented by this word. What does it translate to?

random-oracles.name: A season or environmental aspect
random-oracles.description: A season or environmental aspect. What influence does the weather have on this settlement?

random-event.description: A founder or famous settler (Kei's Hall)

value.name: Quick Settlement Name Generator
value.description: Quickly divine the name of a settlement.

value.name: Character Role
value.description: Divine the role of a character.

random-event.description: Shift focus to someone or something else
Destroy something, or render it useless
Use the terrain to gain advantage
Leverage the advantage of a weapon or ability
Your ritual has the opposite effect
Your friend, ally, or companion is adversely effected
You collapse, and drift into a troubled sleep
You undergo a physical torment which leaves its mark upon you
You hear ghostly voices whispering of dark portents
You are lost in shadow, and find yourself in another place without memory of how you got here
You alert someone or something to your presence
You are not yourself, and act against a friend, ally, or companion
You effect or damage your surroundings, causing a disturbance or potential harm
You suffer the loss of a sense for several hours
You lose connection to magic for a day or so, and cannot perform rituals
Your ritual effects the target in an unexpected and problematic way
Your ritual reveals a surprising and troubling truth
You are tempted by dark powers
You see a troubling vision of your future
You can't perform this ritual again until you acquire an important component
You develop a strange fear or compulsion
Your ritual causes creatures to exhibit strange or aggressive behaviour
You are tormented by an apparition from your past
You are wracked with sudden sickness
Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse.
An assumption is revealed to be false
A more dangerous foe is revealed
You and an enemy share a common goal
You are betrayed by someone who was trusted
The truth of a relationship is revealed
Two seemingly unrelated situations are shown to be connected
Unexpected powers or abilities are revealed
Roll twice more. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it more dramatic.

value.name: Challenge Rank
value.description: Divine the rank of a challenge
